verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: as wet season approaches] [ARG1: mudslide threat] [V: looms] [ARGM-TMP: once again] [ARGM-LOC: over montecito and other communities] [ARGM-ADV: though it been almost a year since mudslides killed at least 21 people in montecito] the santa barbara county office of emergency management warned residents monday that the threat of disaster still exists pacific ocean national weather service carr sacramento california montecito mendocino los angeles times lake santa barbara county office of emergency management mendocino complex shasta michelle mead
